titleInfo.title: Letter, C.G. Olmsted in Franklin, Tenn., to J.G.M. Ramsey in Knoxville, Tenn. 1822 May 6

mods.abstract: 1822 May 6 C.G. Olmsted, Franklin, Tenn., to J.G.M. Ramsey, Knoxville, Tenn. Concerns partial payment of a $600 note held by Dr. Ramsey on Allen Bugg. Discussion of "Old Stephens " who is regarded as a "grand villain" for his many bad debts.

subject.topic: Promissory notes -- Tennessee -- Franklin -- History -- 19th century
Collecting of accounts -- Tennessee -- Franklin -- History -- 19th century
Debtor and creditor – Tennessee -- Franklin -- History – 19th century
Ramsey, J. G. M. (James Gettys McGready), 1797-1884 -- Correspondence
